name: t h r u s t
name_original: t h r u s t
description:
* in level 2 you have to collect 100 thingies. The ui is just a little off-screen.

ENJOY IN FULL SCREEN FOR A SUPER COOL TIME

CONTROLS:

rotate - A, D

thrust - SPACEBAR

zoom in/out - W,S

Collect all the thingies to advance to the next level in this atmospheric jetpacking game. Enjoy the procedural soundtrack, relax, and explore.

Code, 3D Art & Unity Wrangling - Morgan Carlson

2D Art - Josh Horner

Music/SFX - Andy Wiseman

Made for the GMTK Jam 2020 (in just under 48 hours)
